biotools.summary: This workflow provides an automated microbiome data analysis, starting with sequenced taxonomic markers (such as 16SrRNA) and using the standard QIIME2 toolbox to produce an abundance table and preliminary diversity, phylogeny and taxonomy analysis.

bioschemas.name: microSysMics
bioschemas.summary: This workflow provides an automated microbiome data analysis, starting with sequenced taxonomic markers (such as 16SrRNA) and using the standard QIIME2 toolbox to produce an abundance table and preliminary diversity, phylogeny and taxonomy analysis.
